price: Akasema: Mimi ni bora kuliko yeye. Umeniumba kwa moto, na yeye umemuumba kwa udongo.
arabic: قَالَ أَنَا۠ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡهُ خَلَقۡتَنِي مِن نَّارٖ وَخَلَقۡتَهُۥ مِن طِينٖ
footnotes: Iblisi akasema: Mimi ni bora kuliko Adam; kwani Wewe umeniumba kwa moto, na yeye umemuumba kwa udongo. Basi vipi mimi nimsujudie yeye?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla anā khayrun min'hu khalaqtanī min nārin wakhalaqtahu min ṭīnin
